issue.title: [Go] Update flatbuf generated code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14296](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14296). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding Type IDs for the "Large" types so that subsequent changes to implement them can be slightly smaller and not having to add the type id everywhere.
